translation.text: Service adjustments for change to Standard Time
Service adjustments for change to Standard Time

At 2 AM, clocks will be set back one hour from Eastern Daylight Time (EDT) to Eastern Standard Time (EST). This requires us to make some adjustments to our overnight service, detailed below.

You may experience technical difficulties with the TrainTime App and station platform signs if you are traveling during the changeover.

All trains that are enroute during the time change will complete their trips promptly. Trains will not wait an hour for the clock to "catch up" to their schedules.
Eastbound
During the 1 AM EDT hour, regular service will operate, including all regular connections. The 2:25 AM train from Valley Stream to Far Rockaway will instead originate at 1:25 AM EST in order to maintain connections for those coming from Penn Station and Jamaica.

During the 1 AM EST hour, two trains will depart from Penn Station, with no connections available:
1:39 AM EST from Penn Station stopping at Woodside, Forest Hills, Kew Gardens, Jamaica, Rockville Centre, and all stops to Babylon.
1:53 AM EST from Penn Station stopping at Jamaica, Mineola, Westbury, Hicksville, and all stops to Ronkonkoma.
Regular service resumes at 2 AM EST.
Westbound
During the 1 AM EDT hour, regular service will operate.

The following westbound trains scheduled to begin their trips during the 2 AM hour will instead operate during the 1 AM EST hour:
The 2:13 AM train from Ronkonkoma to Penn Station will depart Ronkonkoma at 1:13 AM EST.
The 2:19 AM train from Huntington to Penn Station will depart Huntington at 1:19 AM EST.
The 2:27 AM train from Bayside to Penn Station will depart Bayside at 1:27 AM EST. The shuttle bus from Port Washington will depart at 1:24 AM EDT.
No trains will begin their trips in the 2 AM EST hour.

Regular service resumes at 3 AM EST.

At 2 AM, clocks will be set back one hour from Eastern Daylight Time (EDT) to Eastern Standard Time (EST). This requires us to make some adjustments to our overnight service, detailed below.

You may experience technical difficulties with the TrainTime App and station platform signs if you are traveling during the changeover.

All trains that are enroute during the time change will complete their trips promptly. Trains will not wait an hour for the clock to "catch up" to their schedules.

Eastbound

During the 1 AM EDT hour, regular service will operate, including all regular connections. The 2:25 AM train from Valley Stream to Far Rockaway will instead originate at 1:25 AM EST in order to maintain connections for those coming from Penn Station and Jamaica.

During the 1 AM EST hour, two trains will depart from Penn Station, with no connections available:

  • 1:39 AM EST from Penn Station stopping at Woodside, Forest Hills, Kew Gardens, Jamaica, Rockville Centre, and all stops to Babylon.

  • 1:53 AM EST from Penn Station stopping at Jamaica, Mineola, Westbury, Hicksville, and all stops to Ronkonkoma.

Regular service resumes at 2 AM EST.

Westbound

During the 1 AM EDT hour, regular service will operate.

The following westbound trains scheduled to begin their trips during the 2 AM hour will instead operate during the 1 AM EST hour:

  • The 2:13 AM train from Ronkonkoma to Penn Station will depart Ronkonkoma at 1:13 AM EST.

  • The 2:19 AM train from Huntington to Penn Station will depart Huntington at 1:19 AM EST.

  • The 2:27 AM train from Bayside to Penn Station will depart Bayside at 1:27 AM EST. The shuttle bus from Port Washington will depart at 1:24 AM EDT.

No trains will begin their trips in the 2 AM EST hour.

Regular service resumes at 3 AM EST.
Nov 6, Sunday, 1:00 AM to 3:00 AM
Some trains leave up to 7 minutes earlier than usual, and five afternoon trains are cancelled
Some trains leave up to 7 minutes earlier than usual, and five afternoon trains are cancelled

The following trains are cancelled:
Eastbound
The 4:40 PM from Penn to Port Washington is cancelled. The 4:43 PM from Penn to Great Neck will leave 10 minutes later and is extended to Port Washington.
The 5:26 PM from Penn to Port Washington is cancelled. The 5:20 PM from Penn to Great Neck will be extended to Port Washington.
The 6:14 PM from Penn to Great Neck is cancelled. The 6:10 PM from Penn to Port Washington will make all stops.
Westbound
The 5:44 PM from Great Neck due Penn at 6:17 PM is cancelled.
The 6:23 PM from Great Neck due Penn at 6:58 PM is cancelled. The 6:24 PM from Port Washington to Penn will make all stops.
Please use the TrainTime app to plan your trip. These schedule changes are in support of track and signal work east of Great Neck as we finish up the Great Neck Pocket Track. We thank you for your patience.

The following trains are cancelled:

Eastbound

  • The 4:40 PM from Penn to Port Washington is cancelled. The 4:43 PM from Penn to Great Neck will leave 10 minutes later and is extended to Port Washington.

  • The 5:26 PM from Penn to Port Washington is cancelled. The 5:20 PM from Penn to Great Neck will be extended to Port Washington.

  • The 6:14 PM from Penn to Great Neck is cancelled. The 6:10 PM from Penn to Port Washington will make all stops.

Westbound

  • The 5:44 PM from Great Neck due Penn at 6:17 PM is cancelled.

  • The 6:23 PM from Great Neck due Penn at 6:58 PM is cancelled. The 6:24 PM from Port Washington to Penn will make all stops.

Please use the TrainTime app to plan your trip. These schedule changes are in support of track and signal work east of Great Neck as we finish up the Great Neck Pocket Track. We thank you for your patience.
Nov 7 - 11 and Nov 14 - 18, Mon to Fri
Buses replace trains between Bayside and Port Washington
Buses replace trains between Bayside and Port Washington

Trains will run on regular schedules between Penn Station and Bayside.

Bus service will run every hour between Bayside and Port Washington, making all stops except Plandome.
Buses will not stop at Plandome due to low bridges in the area. Customers should use the bus stop at Manhasset instead.

The last trains to run on Friday night are the 9:48 PM from Penn Station and the 10:38 PM from Port Washington. Service resumes with the 3:18 AM from Penn Station and the 3:23 AM from Port Washington on Monday morning.

Trains will run on regular schedules between Penn Station and Bayside.

Bus service will run every hour between Bayside and Port Washington, making all stops except Plandome.

Buses will not stop at Plandome due to low bridges in the area. Customers should use the bus stop at Manhasset instead.

The last trains to run on Friday night are the 9:48 PM from Penn Station and the 10:38 PM from Port Washington. Service resumes with the 3:18 AM from Penn Station and the 3:23 AM from Port Washington on Monday morning.
Nov 4 - 7, Nov 11 - 14, and Nov 18 - 21, Fri 10:30 PM to Mon 3:00 AM

Buses replace trains between Great Neck and Port Washington
Trains run every hour between Penn Station and Great Neck, making all stops

Buses replace trains between Great Neck and Port Washington
Trains run every hour between Penn Station and Great Neck, making all stops

Buses will connect Great Neck with Manhasset and Port Washington, and vans will connect Great Neck with Plandome while we work on the Great Neck Pocket Track. Westbound buses/vans will leave up to 40 minutes earlier than normal train times.

The last trains to run to/from Port Washington are the 8:51 AM from Penn Station and the 9:40 AM from Port Washington. Service resumes with the 2:48 PM from Penn Station and the 3:41 PM from Port Washington.

Buses will connect Great Neck with Manhasset and Port Washington, and vans will connect Great Neck with Plandome while we work on the Great Neck Pocket Track. Westbound buses/vans will leave up to 40 minutes earlier than normal train times.

The last trains to run to/from Port Washington are the 8:51 AM from Penn Station and the 9:40 AM from Port Washington. Service resumes with the 2:48 PM from Penn Station and the 3:41 PM from Port Washington.
Nov 1 - 3, Tue to Thu, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
No trains between Jamaica and East Williston
No trains between Jamaica and East Williston

Eastbound riders will board the 9:42 or 10:37 PM trains from Penn Station and transfer at Mineola for bus service to East Williston, where train service resumes.

Westbound riders on the 9:40 and 10:48 PM trains from Oyster Bay will transfer at East Williston for bus service to Mineola where trains are available.

Eastbound riders will board the 9:42 or 10:37 PM trains from Penn Station and transfer at Mineola for bus service to East Williston, where train service resumes.

Westbound riders on the 9:40 and 10:48 PM trains from Oyster Bay will transfer at East Williston for bus service to Mineola where trains are available.
Starting at 10 PM Friday October 28
Buses replace trains between Huntington and Port Jefferson
Buses replace trains between Huntington and Port Jefferson

If possible, consider using the Ronkonkoma Branch while we perform track inspections. If you need to use bus service, be advised that westbound buses will depart up to 40 minutes earlier than normal train times.

The last trains to operate are the 8:17 AM from Jamaica and the 9:07 AM from Port Jefferson. Service resumes with the 4:06 PM from Huntington and the 4:06 PM from Port Jefferson.

If possible, consider using the Ronkonkoma Branch while we perform track inspections. If you need to use bus service, be advised that westbound buses will depart up to 40 minutes earlier than normal train times.

The last trains to operate are the 8:17 AM from Jamaica and the 9:07 AM from Port Jefferson. Service resumes with the 4:06 PM from Huntington and the 4:06 PM from Port Jefferson.
Oct 25 - 26, Tue and Wed, 10:00 AM to 3:30 PM
There is no LIRR service to/from UBS Arena this weekend
There is no LIRR service to/from UBS Arena this weekend

While we test the new signal system near Queens Village, we will not be able to run trains to Belmont Park or Elmont-UBS Arena stations this weekend.

Please consider alternate transportation if you are going to the Islanders game on Saturday. We apologize for the inconvenience.

While we test the new signal system near Queens Village, we will not be able to run trains to Belmont Park or Elmont-UBS Arena stations this weekend.

Please consider alternate transportation if you are going to the Islanders game on Saturday. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Saturday, October 29
No trains between Jamaica and Hempstead
No trains between Jamaica and Hempstead

Trains will run between Atlantic Terminal and Jamaica only. Bus service will be available from Jamaica in two sections:
Stopping at Hollis, Queens Village, Bellerose, and Mineola; with select buses also serving East Williston.
Stopping at Floral Park, Stewart Manor, Nassau Boulevard, Garden City, and Hempstead.
The last trains to run on Friday night are the 9:42 PM from Atlantic Terminal and the 10:16 PM from Hempstead. Service resumes with the 3:56 AM from Hempstead and the 5:48 AM from Jamaica on Monday morning.

Please consider using the West Hempstead Branch, Lynbrook, or Valley Stream stations instead. We appreciate your patience while we test signals near Queens Village.

Trains will run between Atlantic Terminal and Jamaica only. Bus service will be available from Jamaica in two sections:

  • Stopping at Hollis, Queens Village, Bellerose, and Mineola; with select buses also serving East Williston.

  • Stopping at Floral Park, Stewart Manor, Nassau Boulevard, Garden City, and Hempstead.

The last trains to run on Friday night are the 9:42 PM from Atlantic Terminal and the 10:16 PM from Hempstead. Service resumes with the 3:56 AM from Hempstead and the 5:48 AM from Jamaica on Monday morning.

Please consider using the West Hempstead Branch, Lynbrook, or Valley Stream stations instead. We appreciate your patience while we test signals near Queens Village.
Oct 28 - 31, Fri 9:45 PM to Mon 3:45 AM
Minor schedule and connection adjustments
Minor schedule and connection adjustments

Special timetables are in effect systemwide while we test the new signal system near Queens Village

While there are no major changes to service on this branch, you should check the TrainTime app or the special PDF timetables for minor changes in departure and connecting train times that may affect your trip.

No trains between Jamaica and East Williston
No trains between Jamaica and East Williston

Shuttle buses connect East Williston, Mineola, and Jamaica, where train service is available. Click here to learn more about this service change.

Please allow up to 60 minutes of additional travel time or consider using the Port Washington Branch instead.

For detailed schedule information, use the LIRR TrainTime app.

Shuttle buses connect East Williston, Mineola, and Jamaica, where train service is available. Click here to learn more about this service change.

Please allow up to 60 minutes of additional travel time or consider using the Port Washington Branch instead.

For detailed schedule information, use the LIRR TrainTime app.
Oct 29 - 31, Sat 12:15 AM to Mon 2:30 AM
No trains between Jamaica and Hicksville
No trains between Jamaica and Hicksville

Trains run in four sections while we test the new signal system near Queens Village:
Between Greenport and Ronkonkoma
Between Ronkonkoma and Hicksville (bypassing Bethpage)
Between Hicksville and Babylon (stopping at Bethpage)
Between Babylon and Jamaica/Penn Station
Transfer at Hicksville and Babylon for continuing service. Please allow up to 60 minutes of additional travel time or consider using the Babylon or Montauk Branches instead. Click here to learn more about this service change.

Bethpage riders: To travel towards Jamaica, wait on Platform B for a bi-level train to Babylon. To travel towards Ronkonkoma, wait on Platform A for a bi-level train to Hicksville. Use caution when crossing the tracks at Stewart Ave.

For detailed schedule information, use the LIRR TrainTime app.

  • Between Greenport and Ronkonkoma

  • Between Ronkonkoma and Hicksville (bypassing Bethpage)

  • Between Hicksville and Babylon (stopping at Bethpage)

  • Between Babylon and Jamaica/Penn Station

Transfer at Hicksville and Babylon for continuing service. Please allow up to 60 minutes of additional travel time or consider using the Babylon or Montauk Branches instead. Click here to learn more about this service change.

For detailed schedule information, use the LIRR TrainTime app.

No trains between Jamaica and Hicksville

Between Huntington or Port Jefferson and Hicksville
Between Hicksville and Babylon
Between Babylon and Jamaica/Penn Station
Transfer at Hicksville and Babylon for continuing service. Please allow up to 60 minutes of additional travel time or consider using the Babylon or Montauk Branches instead. Click here to learn more about this service change.

NICE will accept LIRR tickets on the n22 and n24 buses between Jamaica and Hicksville. Shuttle bus service is also available between Jamaica and Mineola, but will not stop at New Hyde Park or Merillon Avenue.

For detailed schedule information, use the LIRR TrainTime app.

Event service only
Event service only
Trains only run to Belmont Park station when there are events at UBS Arena or Belmont Park.

Every day
Trains leave up to 5 minutes earlier than normal
Trains leave up to 5 minutes earlier than normal
Trains will make added stops at Floral Park, Queens Village, and Hollis while Hempstead Branch service is suspended.
Trains will make added stops at Floral Park, Queens Village, and Hollis while Hempstead Branch service is suspended.
Saturday and Sunday, Nov 12 - 13
No trains between Jamaica and Hempstead
No trains between Jamaica and Hempstead

Ronkonkoma Branch trains will stop at Hollis, Queens Village, and Floral Park.
For Elmont-UBS Arena, use Belmont Park station instead.
For Bellerose, transfer at Queens Village for bus service.
For Stewart Manor, Nassau Boulevard, Garden City, and Hempstead, transfer at Mineola for bus service.
There is no service at Country Life Press. Use Mineola or Garden City stations instead.
If you can, use nearby New Hyde Park, Merillon Avenue, or Mineola stations, as bus service will add 30 minutes of extra travel time.

The last trains to operate on Friday night are the 11:36 PM from Hempstead and the 11:44 PM from Atlantic Terminal. Service resumes with the 12:16 AM from Hempstead and 1:49 AM from Atlantic Terminal on Monday morning.

We are installing longer-lasting concrete ties between Bellerose and Floral Park.

  • For Bellerose, transfer at Queens Village for bus service.

  • There is no service at Country Life Press. Use Mineola or Garden City stations instead.

If you can, use nearby New Hyde Park, Merillon Avenue, or Mineola stations, as bus service will add 30 minutes of extra travel time.

The last trains to operate on Friday night are the 11:36 PM from Hempstead and the 11:44 PM from Atlantic Terminal. Service resumes with the 12:16 AM from Hempstead and 1:49 AM from Atlantic Terminal on Monday morning.

We are installing longer-lasting concrete ties between Bellerose and Floral Park.

Two westbound trains leave later
Two westbound trains leave later

The 10:16 PM westbound train from Hempstead will depart at 10:40 PM.
The 11:19 PM westbound train from Hempstead will depart at 11:36 PM.

These adjustments are in preparation for weekend concrete tie installation near Floral Park. Please listen for station announcements as trains will share one track between Bellerose and Garden City during this time.

The 10:16 PM westbound train from Hempstead will depart at 10:40 PM.

The 11:19 PM westbound train from Hempstead will depart at 11:36 PM.

These adjustments are in preparation for weekend concrete tie installation near Floral Park. Please listen for station announcements as trains will share one track between Bellerose and Garden City during this time.
Nov 11, Friday, 10:15 PM to 11:59 PM
